answers.author: Lisa Tiffin
answers.text:
Hi Phin-
The City of Brooks has many positions on our staff which we share with the county that surrounds us.  We have a Grants Administrator and a team of Corporate Safety Officers.  The region has also implemented a regional IT system in which County employees offer support and expertise to much smaller, rural communities.  For Public Works, rather than sharing employees, we have monthly "Regional Public Works Meetings" in which all the PW departments in the region get together and discuss ways that they can support each other through knowledge, experience and equipment sharing.
If you'd like more information on any of the above initiatives, please contact me at ltiffin@brooks.ca.
Lisa Tiffin
Communications
City of Brooks, Alberta, Canada

answers.text:
Washoe County and the City of Reno, Nevada just had a report completed by Matrix Consulting that looked at shared services between the City and County in the areas of HR, IT and Purchasing.  Here's the link to that report.  http://www.washoecounty.us/repository/files/2/shared_services_report.pdf
We would love to see what you come up with in terms of other information or studies.
Dave Childs
Assistant County Manager
Washoe County, Nevada

author: Phin Xaypangna
text:
I am interested in any organization who has consolidated the following departments and/or functions within these departments:  Information Technology, Public Information and Human Resources.  
Has your organization gone through this process?  If so, please share any information you might have.  
Thank you.
phin.xaypangna@mecklenburgcountync.gov
title: Shared Services
